title_en: INDOOR-LiDAR: Bridging Simulation and Reality for Robot-Centric 360 degree Indoor LiDAR Perception -- A Robot-Centric Hybrid Dataset
title_zh: INDOOR-LiDAR：面向机器人中心化360度室内激光雷达感知的仿真与真实数据桥梁——一个机器人中心的混合数据集
summary_en: We present INDOOR-LIDAR, a comprehensive hybrid dataset of indoor 3D LiDAR point clouds designed to advance research in robot perception. Existing indoor LiDAR datasets often suffer from limited scale, inconsistent annotation formats, and human-induced variability during data collection. INDOOR-LIDAR addresses these limitations by integrating simulated environments with real-world scans acquired using autonomous ground robots, providing consistent coverage and realistic sensor behavior under controlled variations. Each sample consists of dense point cloud data enriched with intensity measurements and KITTI-style annotations. The annotation schema encompasses common indoor object categories within various scenes. The simulated subset enables flexible configuration of layouts, point densities, and occlusions, while the real-world subset captures authentic sensor noise, clutter, and domain-specific artifacts characteristic of real indoor settings. INDOOR-LIDAR supports a wide range of applications including 3D object detection, bird's-eye-view (BEV) perception, SLAM, semantic scene understanding, and domain adaptation between simulated and real indoor domains. By bridging the gap between synthetic and real-world data, INDOOR-LIDAR establishes a scalable, realistic, and reproducible benchmark for advancing robotic perception in complex indoor environments.
summary_zh: 本文提出INDOOR-LIDAR——一个面向机器人感知研究的综合性室内三维激光雷达点云混合数据集。现有室内激光雷达数据集普遍存在规模有限、标注格式不一致以及数据收集中人为引入的变异性等问题。INDOOR-LIDAR通过将仿真环境与自主地面机器人采集的真实扫描数据相融合，在可控变量条件下提供连续覆盖和真实传感器行为，从而突破这些局限。每个样本均包含富含强度测量的稠密点云数据及KITTI风格标注。标注体系涵盖多种场景中的常见室内物体类别：仿真子集支持对场景布局、点云密度和遮挡关系的灵活配置，而真实子集则捕捉了真实室内环境中特有的传感器噪声、杂乱背景和领域特异性伪影。本数据集支持三维目标检测、鸟瞰图感知、同步定位与建图、语义场景理解以及仿真与真实室内领域间的域适应等多种应用。通过弥合合成数据与真实数据之间的鸿沟，INDOOR-LIDAR为推进复杂室内环境下的机器人感知研究建立了可扩展、高真实度且可复现的基准。
